verses.roman:
pūṣā dhanañjayo vātaḥ
suṣeṇaḥ surucis tathā
ghṛtācī gautamaś ceti
tapo-māsaṁ nayanty amī

synonyms: pūṣā dhanañjayaḥ vātaḥ—Pūṣā, Dhanañjaya and Vāta; suṣeṇaḥ suruciḥ—Suṣeṇa and Suruci; tathā—also; ghṛtācī gautamaḥ—Ghṛtācī and Gautama; ca—as well; iti—thus; tapaḥ-māsam—the month of Tapas (Māgha); nayanti—rule; amī—these.
translation: Pūṣā as the sun-god, Dhanañjaya as the Nāga, Vāta as the Rākṣasa, Suṣeṇa as the Gandharva, Suruci as the Yakṣa, Ghṛtācī as the Apsarā and Gautama as the sage rule the month of Tapas.
